snippet: When the Knicks trailed the Nuggets on Sunday, Carmelo Anthony put his faith in his teammate Jason Kidd to lead the team to a win.
abstract: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony and point guard Jason Kidd are instrumental in team's win over Denver Nuggets; Knicks so far have a plus-98 scoring differential with Kidd in the game.
lead_paragraph: When the Knicks trailed the Nuggets on Sunday, Carmelo Anthony put his faith in his teammate Jason Kidd to lead the team to a win.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony Likes Knicks’ Offense to Go Through Jason Kidd
headline.main: Even Anthony Likes Offense to Go Through Kidd
headline.print_headline: Even Anthony Likes Offense to Go Through Kidd
